articles.title: Patriots injury report: Christian Gonzalez, Keion White ruled out vs. Dolphins
articles.description:
Gonzalez has not practiced since July 28 due to a hamstring injury.

The post Patriots injury report: Christian Gonzalez, Keion White ruled out vs. Dolphins appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Christian Gonzalez and Keion White are ruled out for the Patriots' game against the Dolphins.
Gonzalez has not practiced since July 28 due to a hamstring injury.
Their absence may affect the Patriots' defensive strategy in the upcoming game.

articles.title: With DC Terrell Williams out, who will be calling defensive plays for Patriots vs. Dolphins?
articles.description:
Inside linebackers coach Zak Kuhr will call defensive plays for Sunday's game.

The post With DC Terrell Williams out, who will be calling defensive plays for Patriots vs. Dolphins? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Inside linebackers coach Zak Kuhr will call defensive plays for the Patriots against the Dolphins.
Defensive coordinator Terrell Williams is unavailable for the game on September 17, 2023.
This change may affect the Patriots' defensive strategy and performance in a crucial matchup.
